welcomTxt:
We create affordable holidays
for our clients worldwide
AbtTxtOne: One of the leading travel companies in Uzbekistan and Central Asia, founded in 2020 on the basis of the iTours travel operator and the leader in the CIS tour operator market - TUI Russia & CIS, which is part of the largest international travel holding TUI Group.
AbtTxtSecond: The iTours tour operator has been successfully operating in the Uzbek market since 2001 and has held a leading position among national companies, which has provided TUI with a leading position in the Uzbek market as the largest multidisciplinary tour operator. In 2016, the tour operator became a member of the Touristik Kamkor Association of the Tourist Guarantee Fund of Uzbekistan, which can be joined by tour operators with bank guarantees that assume obligations to protect the rights of citizens traveling abroad.
AbtTxtThird: TUI Uzbekistan and Central Asia has partnerships with more than 1000 agencies in Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan and Uzbekistan. The company offers sightseeing and beach holidays in such areas as Turkey, Georgia, Egypt, the United Arab Emirates, the Maldives, Thailand and the countries of the European Union.
TeamAdres: Mirabad district, st. Shymkent, house 8 sq. 33
FormTitle: Ready for a vacation? Leave a request, we will help make your vacation the most unforgettable
